textBeforeTable: Patent Citations [0038]124 Full view button [0037]122 Annotation view button [0036]120 Picture comment area [0035]118 Picture information area [0034]116 Information box/area [0033]114 Thumbnail explanation area [0032]112 GUI exit button [0031]110 Word search region [0030]108 Graphical browser region [0029]106 Picture content iconic region [0028]104 Hierarchical picture grouping iconic region [0027]102 GUI main display area [0026]100 Graphical user interface (GUI) main display level Parts List [0025] Variations and modifications of the present invention are possible, given the above description. However, all variations and modifications which are obvious to those skilled in the art to which the present invention pertains are considered to be within the scope of the protection granted by this Letters Patent. [0024] A user can choose to navigate the pictures in the picture database by activating the “Search” region 110 of the present-inventive GUI. This permits the user to use Boolean searches and other advanced word-search methods available in the present-inventive GUI. [0023] In the example of FIG. 6, the user has chosen a three-dimensional scatter plot browser with icons, and with first and second axes representing separate category information, and the third dimension being determined by the
